content.question: Where both expressions are defined, which of the following is equivalent to <math alttext="fraction numerator sec squared x minus 1 over denominator sec squared x end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>sec</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>sec</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="fraction numerator tan squared x over denominator sin squared x end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="fraction numerator tan squared x over denominator cos squared x end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
